A Little About Myself

I have recognized skills in leadership developed from 4 years of military service upon the USS Ashland and USS Tortuga in Sasebo Japan. I always ensure tasks are accomplished effectively and accurately, always looking for a new challenge. I thrive in a team setting where I can provide unparalleled delegation to achieve success. Proven level head nature and adaption when tackling challenging situations.I am currently enrolled at the College of Western Idaho and working full time as a Kitchen Manager at Chipotle. However my new found love for coding and troubleshooting has stirred me up into pursuing this seriously with every intention of making a career out of this. I look forward to hearing from you and working with you.

Examples

The First example you'll see is a class project I came up with called ShirtZ, a T-shirt designing company that specializes for catering and special events, all the shirts you see were designed by me in photoshop. The other example is a website I designed in class for a friend of mine who owns a pub and grill in Meridian Idaho called The Firehouse Pub and Grill. You'll notice immediately that my personal preference leans towards having a darker theme. But to show that I'm not limited to just that I made this portfolio page the opposite of my previous counter parts.
